General.Name: IX Energy Holdings Inc
General.Description: IX Energy Holdings, Inc. engages in the development of solar power and other renewable energy solutions systems for government agencies, municipalities and commercial customers. IX Energy Holdings, Inc. was formerly known as Yoo, Inc. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 711 Third Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10017
